titles.title: A resolution honoring the 100th anniversary of the creation of Wonder Bread in Indianapolis, Indiana.
A resolution honoring the 100th anniversary of the creation of Wonder Bread in Indianapolis, Indiana.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that the 100th anniversary of the launching of Wonder Bread in Indianapolis, Indiana, is a moment to celebrate U.S. heritage and the innovation of the people of the United States.
